content: With the disclaimer that I listen to Dave Ramsey to stay motivated to pay off my student loans as quickly as possible (I’m not a Ramsey freak — I still use a credit card to maintain a high score), I think this “embrace debt” philosophy is incredibly wrong. Debt=risk. There is no way around it. As a country, we are in so much debt of so many kinds. We suck at teaching personal finance to young people. The last thing we need is rich people telling us to finance $hit. Awful.
